yes pip install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu is still not working with CUDDN 6

is still not working with CUDDN 6

body:
yes
pip install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu
is still not working with CUDDN 6

On Thu, Jul 13, 2017 at 11:54 AM, Carles Mateu <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I guess that:
> pip install --upgrade tensorflow
> Installs the non-gpu version, so it has no issues with CUDDN 6, logically.
>
